Authors:
Sukanya Haituk, Ratchadawan Cheewangkoon, Sinang Hongsanan,
Chanokned Senwanna, Nakarin Suwannarach
Title:
New epiphytic sooty molds, Alloscorias syngonii
(Readerielliopsidaceae) from Thailand
Abstract:
The novel taxon was found as epiphytic sooty molds on
Syngonium podophyllum from Thailand. A new genus Alloscorias is
established to accommodate this novel taxon, named A. syngonii. The
coelomycetous character of the asexual morph is observed on culture
media. Phylogenetic analyses of a combined dataset of LSU, ITS, TEF-1Î±
and RPB2 sequence data together with morphological indicate that
Alloscorias is a distinct genus within Readerielliopsidaceae. Detailed
descriptions and illustrations are provided in this paper.
